TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SystemWebSectionGroup extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup
Public NotInheritable Class SystemWebSectionGroup Inherits ConfigurationSectionGroup

summary.span: 允許使用者以程式的方式存取組態檔的 群組。

span.span: Allows the user to programmatically access the group of the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是指`system.web`群組組態檔內。The class refers to the `system.web` group within a configuration file. 您可以使用這個型別存取任何包含此群組中的章節。You can use this type to access any of the sections contained in this group. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得從現有的 Web 應用程式相關聯的組態檔的物件。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file associated with an existing Web application. 您可以使用此物件來存取的章節中所包含`system.web`群組。You can use this object to access the sections contained in the `system.web` group. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebSectionGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebSectionGroup/CS/SystemWebSectionGroup.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebSectionGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebSectionGroup/VB/SystemWebSectionGroup.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 建立 的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 組態系統會呼叫這個建構函式，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This constructor is called by the ASP.NET configuration system and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 您可以取得的執行個體類別使用方法。You can obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會參考組態檔的 `anonymousIdentification` 區段。The object refers to the `anonymousIdentification` section of the configuration file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得從現有的 Web 應用程式的組態檔的物件。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application.
